vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.cashOut (patch_5.sol#20-25):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(msg.sender.call.value(_am)(),Transaction failed.) (patch_5.sol#22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_5.sol#23)
